snippet.title: UNO Playstation Network official trailer by Gameloft
snippet.description:
UNO is now available for the PS3™ system in the US. With a multiplayer mode played on one PS3™ system or on PlayStation®Network, UNO™ has never been so fun and easy, so be the first to get rid of all your cards!

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
